trans-unit.source: If-Then-Else Expression Example: BizTalk Services
trans-unit.target: If-Then-Else Expression Example: BizTalk Services

trans-unit.source: Lists If-Then-Else example in <token>af_integration_full</token>.
trans-unit.target: Lists If-Then-Else example in <token>af_integration_full</token>.

trans-unit.source: If-Then-Else Expression Example
trans-unit.target: If-Then-Else Expression Example

trans-unit.source: There is a <legacyBold>Zip</legacyBold> field in the input document and a <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> field in the output document.
trans-unit.target: There is a <legacyBold>Zip</legacyBold> field in the input document and a <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> field in the output document.

trans-unit.source: If the <legacyBold>Zip</legacyBold> is 98052 in the input document, then the <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> field in the output document is updated with <legacyBold>WA</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: If the <legacyBold>Zip</legacyBold> is 98052 in the input document, then the <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> field in the output document is updated with <legacyBold>WA</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: If the <legacyBold>Zip</legacyBold> is not 98052, <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> is updated with <legacyBold>Other</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: If the <legacyBold>Zip</legacyBold> is not 98052, <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> is updated with <legacyBold>Other</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: To do this, add an If-Then-Else Expression <token>mapop</token> to the <token>transform</token>:
trans-unit.target: To do this, add an If-Then-Else Expression <token>mapop</token> to the <token>transform</token>:

trans-unit.source: Drag the If-Then-Else Expression to the <token>transform</token> Designer area.
trans-unit.target: Drag the If-Then-Else Expression to the <token>transform</token> Designer area.

trans-unit.source: Create a link from the <legacyBold>Zip</legacyBold> field in the input document to this If-Then-Else Expression.
trans-unit.target: Create a link from the <legacyBold>Zip</legacyBold> field in the input document to this If-Then-Else Expression.

trans-unit.source: Create a link from the <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> field in the output document to this If-Then-Else Expression.
trans-unit.target: Create a link from the <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> field in the output document to this If-Then-Else Expression.

trans-unit.source: Configure the If-Then-Else Expression with the following parameters:
trans-unit.target: Configure the If-Then-Else Expression with the following parameters:

trans-unit.source: Zip
trans-unit.target: Zip

trans-unit.source: The <legacyItalic>input</legacyItalic> name will be displayed as the node name it is connected to in the input document.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyItalic>input</legacyItalic> name will be displayed as the node name it is connected to in the input document.

trans-unit.source: Zip
trans-unit.target: Zip

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: Condition

trans-unit.source: Then Value
trans-unit.target: Then Value

trans-unit.source: “WA”
trans-unit.target: “WA”

trans-unit.source: Else Value
trans-unit.target: Else Value

trans-unit.source: “Other”
trans-unit.target: “Other”

trans-unit.source: With this <token>transform</token>, the <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> node in the output is populated with <legacyBold>WA</legacyBold> if the zip code is 98052.
trans-unit.target: With this <token>transform</token>, the <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> node in the output is populated with <legacyBold>WA</legacyBold> if the zip code is 98052.

trans-unit.source: If the zip code is not 98052, the <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> node is populated with <legacyBold>Other</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: If the zip code is not 98052, the <legacyBold>State</legacyBold> node is populated with <legacyBold>Other</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Error and Data Handling
trans-unit.target: Error and Data Handling

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs with an <ui>If-Then-Else Expression</ui> <token>mapop</token>, by default, the entire <token>transform</token> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: If an error occurs with an <ui>If-Then-Else Expression</ui> <token>mapop</token>, by default, the entire <token>transform</token> is aborted.

trans-unit.source: This error handling behavior is configurable.
trans-unit.target: This error handling behavior is configurable.

trans-unit.source: See <embeddedLabel>Error and Data Handling</embeddedLabel> at <link xlink:href="567064b1-5b6d-4209-baf1-c730279f8d04" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Expressions</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <embeddedLabel>Error and Data Handling</embeddedLabel> at <link xlink:href="567064b1-5b6d-4209-baf1-c730279f8d04" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Expressions</link>.
